name: Will

responses.ignored Return: I don't really want to talk right now.
responses.Falsely Accused: I have nothing to say to you.
responses.Big Footprint: Oh yes, I could fit into those. So could %NPC, I think.
responses.Small Footprint: Too small for me. You might have better luck with %NPC.
responses.Glasses: No, I do not have glasses. %NPC does, though.
responses.Bag: I don't have a bag with me. %NPC always does, though.
responses.Lipstick: I actually do have some Lipstick. I got it from %NPC.
responses.Right Handed: I am right handed. So is %NPC.
responses.Dark Hair: I do have dark hair, yes. So does %NPC.
responses.Broken Mobile Phone: Nope. %NPC has a phone like that though.

noneResponses: Sorry I have some sound to render.
And why would i help you.

motives.Colin: I wanted to make a transitive relation between me, my weapon and him.
motives.Diana: She spat in my ear. I think it was an accident. But still.
motives.Lily: She once cut me in line to see Star Wars - I didn't get in!
motives.Mary: She beat me in a poetry writing contest.
motives.Mike: He once dripped molten solder on me. I still have the scar.
